title: Games are suppose to be fun. Most people dont have fun playing support. This equals problem.
body:
Imposing a duty on players who play a game because they want to ENJOY it, ruins the game on many levels. Forcing you to play support...its like taking your turn for guard duty. You don't want to do it, but you have to.

I understand some people like playing support, but the fact that autofill basically means support should tell you how unpopular and unfun most people think it is.

Riot should figure out a way to make support more fun, or some incentive that makes it more popular. 

Remember, games are supposed to be FUN.

Support is my favorite role and in Blinds i only run into a very small amount of "DOUCHE ADC" players who think they can decide what i buy and what i do. 

To be a good support... 
You have to play like you were that ADC. if you feel the lane should be pushing at the moment then you can help "Speed up" the ADC by taking some health off of minions so they can kill them faster and the lane will push. 

Thats your decision to help as support. if the ADC doesnt like it... too bad. its not just his lane and like him you want to win the lane. If he sees you speeding up he can ask you to slow down or speed up if he feels so inclined but in my experience.. only like 1 out of 30 ADC will even say anything when you are attacking minions to help push. 

I have ran into ADC players who literally fed the enemy team because i was bruising minions. and he said every time i auto attacked a minion he would feed. if you run into this type of ADC.. PLEASE keep attacking the minions and let them feed so you can report them for feeding.
